item.text: At 1st level, character receives 6 Character Option Points. They first set their ability scores and their ability focuses for strength and dexterity. They then select their 7 focused skills that they get for being 1st level. The character then chooses an occupation, selecting any feats or skills that they get for that particular occupation. The character then spends the 6 Character Option Points they receive. They can spend them however they like on their character. For the 1st level, a character spends their points before their skill points or XHP are applied. The character then fills in their defense scores, their carrying capacity, and begins to purchase any equipment necessary for the campaign.
